definition: to arrange/to exhibit/to move to and fro/a pendulum
"hand" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 64), occurring in 提, 把, 打 etc
(final particle, same as 吧)
to stop/to cease/to dismiss/to suspend/to quit/to finish
to break away from/to cast off (old ideas etc)/to get rid of/to break away (from)/to break out (of)/to free oneself from/to extricate oneself
to set up/to arrange/to lay out
to arrange/to set out/to decorate/to display/decorative items
to set up a vendor's stall in the street
to sway/to wobble/to waver
ferry
to sway/to swing/to move back and forth/to oscillate
to move back and forth/to fiddle with
to be fair/to be impartial/to settle (a matter etc)
to wave one's hand/to gesture with one's hand (beckoning, waving good-bye etc)/to swing one's arms
evident/clear/undoubted
to strut/swaggering
hem of a skirt/shirt tail
to arrange/to order about/to manipulate
last time

sentences.english: A shop assistance hung it on a rack or placed it on a table with many others.
sentences.chinese: 店员把它挂到货架上，或与其它东西一起摆到桌子上。

sentences.english: I wonder why Tatai bothered to set such a feast for me?
sentences.chinese: 奇怪，塔塔伊为什么要费事给我摆宴席？

sentences.english: The mixed pendulum is a new one which consists of a simple pendulum and a compound pendulum.
sentences.chinese: 混合摆是由单摆与复摆构成的一种新型摆。

sentences.english: The mixed pendulum is a new one which consists of a simple pendulum and a compound pendulum.
sentences.chinese: 混合摆是由单摆与复摆构成的一种新型摆。

sentences.english: Then the thesis analyzed the significance of applying unscented kalman filter to inverted pendulum system.
sentences.chinese: 分析无迹卡尔曼滤波算法在倒立摆系统上应用的意义。

sentences.english: For my head on a silver plate .
Colorful carnations were placed in florist.
sentences.chinese: 五颜六色的香石竹被摆到花店里。

sentences.english: If you wouldn't put it on the table, don't put it in the pot.
sentences.chinese: 如果你都不愿意把这酒摆上餐桌，那也别倒进锅里去。

sentences.english: Rotary and planar inverted pendulums remain the research stage so far.
sentences.chinese: 环形倒立摆和平面倒立摆尚处于实验室研究阶段。

sentences.english: In the centre of the round table, on a circular glass stand, were some little china figures.
sentences.chinese: 原来在圆桌中央的玻璃圆托盘里摆着几个小瓷人儿。

sentences.english: The coach staggered his players in the back field.
sentences.chinese: 这位教练在后场摆了个锯齿形防守阵式。

sentences.english: Nowadays, many cadres tend to put on a hollow display in their work.
sentences.chinese: 现在的许多干部在工作中为了表现自己往往摆花架子。

sentences.english: He lounged in an left armchair in a stance of deliberconsumed contempt.
sentences.chinese: 他懒洋洋地躺在扶手椅里，用意摆出一种藐视的架势。

sentences.english: The cake maker shakes a naked snake with the qusimilarg rake without sake.
sentences.chinese: 蛋糕制造者无缘无故地用寒战的耙子摆一条赤裸的蛇。

sentences.english: The back of your shirt has worked out of your trousers.
sentences.chinese: 你衬衫的后摆已经抻到裤子外边来了。

sentences.english: The clerk gives customers a long face.
sentences.chinese: 这个店员对顾客摆一张臭脸。

table/desk/classifier for tables of guests at a banquet etc
